title: Brave Browser Introduces The Leo A.I. Assistant
description:
Brave recently released 'Leo', which is a smart A.I. assistant built right in the browser. Ask questions, get answers, with unparalleled privacy.  On this video, I'm trying Leo for the first time by asking it a few basic questions.

REFERENCED:
► https://brave.com/leo/
